traits.name: Danger Sense
traits.desc: The brute has advantage on Dexterity saving throws.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
traits.desc: If the brute fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Rage (4/Day)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the brute can enter a rage for 1 minute. While raging, the brute gains the following benefits: * Advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws * Melee weapon attacks deal an additional 2 damage. * The brute gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

traits.name: Totem of the Bear
traits.desc: While raging, the brute has resistance to all damage psychic damage. Additionally, the brute's carrying capacity is doubled and it has advantage on Strength checks made to push, pull, lift, or break objects.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While not wearing armor, the brute's AC includes its Constitution modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The brute makes two attacks with its greataxe.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage, or 12 (1d12 + 6) slashing damage if raging.
